tasks.task: Planning and constructing a dam for agriculture
subtasks: Determine the appropriate dam type based on landscape
Ensure the dam's longevity through proper planning
Design and locate the outlet to match inflow water volume
Position the spill area to avoid erosion and maintain dam integrity
Install a trickle pipe if needed to prevent outlet and paddock flooding
Excavate the dam site ensuring water covers the excavation to prevent erosion
Use suitable clay material for the dam construction with proper compaction
Ensure proper clay contact (key line) for durability
Restore topsoil after construction for future grassing
Verify proper bank batter (three to one front, two and a half to one back) for strength
Maintain sufficient freeboard (at least one metre) for safety and functionality
